title: Cross-Reference Graph - Kenneth Reitz
description: Kenneth Reitz - Creator of Requests and Certifi, trusted by millions of developers worldwide. Thoughts on technology, philosophy, and building software for humans.
author: Kenneth Reitz
text_content: Cross-Reference Graph Interactive network visualization of connections between essays and ideas. Each node represents an essay, each edge represents a cross-reference. Click and drag nodes to explore the network. Hover over connections to see link text. Reset View Toggle Labels Loading...
